import './chatRooms.css'; import {useEffect, useState} from "react" import Axios from 'axios'; export default function ChatRooms({user}) { Axios.defaults.withCredentials = true; const [conversations, setConversations] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { Axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/conversations/${user._id}`) .then((response) => {setConversations( response.data.sort((p1, p2) => { return new Date(p2.updatedAt) - new Date(p1.updatedAt); }) );}) }, [user]) return (
